Text: Re eBay REVENGE Rare OOP CD New Order Monaco Item Please reply to confirm your shipping address information and choice of shipping options If you have won another CD please add extra priority or standard for combined shipping please read shipping details below International bidders please email me REVENGE Rare OOP CD New Order Monaco Item High bid Please read below for shipping options Hello Congratulations You are the winning bidder for the above listed auction items Please send Money Order or PayPalcom for bid days priority mail shipping handl in g materials packaging in USA only or bid days standard th class mail shipping handling materials packaging in USA only if you live OUTSIDE of the USA please use wwwbidpaycom or send cash by registered mail Because US banks are now charging for processing of foreign money orders I must ask fo r US currency or an additional included with the payment when paying with non US money orders This also includes Canada and add for sh by airmail Everywhere outside of the USA International postage rates will increase on if you want this item to be sent insured seller is not responsible if the item is lost please add in USA only or add International insurance outside the USA and mail to Roger Lin PO BOX Burlingame CA USA Please REPLY and RESPOND with your shipping address info so I can start prepacking your item Failure to respond will result a delay in delivery Also please write down the eBay iem and description on a piece of paper or print out this letter Please remember that Payment MUST arrive within days for US buyers and days for international buyers after the close of auction or Negative Feedback will be posted No exceptions no excuses Sincerely Roger eBay id sellcom email check it out Rentmydvdcom Home wwwrentmydvdcom

Re payment received today thank youeveryone Thank you everyone for your fast and prompt payment I will ship out your items tomorrow morning Please let me know when you receive my items I have also left positive feedback for all of you at ebay Please do the same for me after you receive your merchandises My user id at ebay is sellcom You can view your feedback and item on eBay Thank you very much for your businesses I look forward to doing business again with all of you in the future Thanks again and Take care Sincerely Roger eBay sellcom email check it out A HREFRentmydvdcomA wwwrentmydvdcom
